ResearchProjectDef.label: tactica imperium
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Tactica Imperium is the cornerstone of Imperial military strategy in GrimWorld 40,000. It's a weathered tome filled with battle wisdom, guiding commanders through the complexities of warfare. With its doctrines on combined arms and adaptable tactics, it shapes the minds of Imperial leaders, aiding them in their quest for survival and dominance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: imperium defense
ResearchProjectDef.description: Imperium Defense in GrimWorld 40,000 is a robust network of fortifications showcasing the Imperium's resolve against threats. It includes walls, automated defenses, and strategic positions. Scarred bunkers symbolize defenders' commitment, embodying the Imperium's determination to survive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: militarium armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: In GrimWorld 40,000, Militarum Armor is sturdy protection for Imperial Guard soldiers, made from reinforced ceramite. Marked with the Aquila and regimental insignias, it symbolizes duty and sacrifice. Equipped for hazardous conditions, it stands as a defense against the darkness.

ResearchProjectDef.label: regiments of renown
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Regiments of Renown in GrimWorld 40,000 are elite units within the Imperial Guard, known for their valor and distinction. They carry unique heraldry, battle honors, and exceptional combat prowess, serving as inspirations for fellow Guardsmen. These forces deploy specialized tactics and wield advanced weaponry, showcasing the Imperium's commitment to victory. Legends on the battlefield, they inspire awe and fear, echoing through Imperial history.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Catachan Jungle Fighters
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Catachan Jungle Fighters of Warhammer 40,000 are elite soldiers bred on the death world Catachan. Known for their combat skills and resilience, they wear camouflaged fatigues for jungle warfare. Masters of guerrilla tactics, they ambush enemies with precision. Armed with rugged weaponry, they turn the jungle into a deadly weapon. Their reputation for skill and tenacity is legendary in the Imperium, symbolizing the ability to thrive in hazardous conditions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Death Korps of Krieg
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Death Korps of Krieg in Warhammer 40,000 are disciplined soldiers from the irradiated Death World of Krieg. They wear gas masks and trench coats, reflecting their harsh environment. Known for discipline and resilience, they excel in trench warfare and sieges. Armed with lasguns and heavy artillery, they employ attrition tactics on the battlefield. Each soldier carries the weight of their world's tragic history, exemplifying the resolve needed to defend humanity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mordian Iron Guard
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Mordian Iron Guard in Warhammer 40,000 is a disciplined regiment from the fortress world of Mordian. They wear distinctive uniforms and excel in line formations and defensive tactics. Armed with lasguns and heavy weapons, they bring disciplined firepower to battle. Each soldier embodies precision and order, dedicated to defending the Imperium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tallarn Desert Raiders
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Tallarn Desert Raiders in Warhammer 40,000 are known for their swift and adaptive warfare. Hailing from Tallarn, they excel in desert combat with their mobility and hit-and-run tactics. Clad in desert camouflage, they blend into their surroundings. Armed with lasguns and fast-moving vehicles, they bring rapid firepower to battle. Each soldier embodies adaptability and mastery of desert warfare, showcasing the Imperium's ability to produce specialized forces.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tempestus Scions
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Tempestus Scions in Warhammer 40,000 are elite shock troops within the Imperial Guard. Clad in advanced carapace armor, they excel in precision missions and rapid deployment. Armed with hot-shot lasguns, they bring potent firepower to battle. Each Scion symbolizes the Imperium's commitment to producing highly trained shock troops to face threats in the 41st millennium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Valhallan Ice Warriors
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Valhallan Ice Warriors in Warhammer 40,000 are stalwart defenders from the frozen world of Valhalla. Cloaked in winter gear, they excel in enduring extreme cold and expert marksmanship. Armed with lasguns and heavy weapons, they bring potent firepower to battle. Each soldier embodies resilience and adaptability, showcasing the Imperium's capacity to produce specialized forces for the harsh realities of the 41st millennium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vostoyan Firstborn
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Vostroyan Firstborn in Warhammer 40,000 are a distinguished regiment from the hive world of Vostroya. Adorned in elaborate carapace armor, they excel in marksmanship and methodical tactics. Armed with lasguns and ornate weaponry, they bring lethal firepower to battle. Each soldier embodies the regiment's heritage and commitment to excellence, showcasing the Imperium's capacity to produce specialized forces for the challenges of the 41st millennium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Kasrkin Elite Troops
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Kasrkin in Warhammer 40,000 are elite troops within the Imperial Guard, known for their specialized training and discipline. Adorned in distinctive carapace armor, they excel in various battlefield scenarios. Armed with hot-shot lasguns, they bring formidable firepower to critical missions. Each soldier embodies the Imperium's commitment to producing an elite force for the challenges of the 41st millennium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Armageddon Steel Legion
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Armageddon Steel Legion in Warhammer 40,000 is a disciplined regiment from the industrial world of Armageddon. Clad in gas masks and flak armor, they excel in urban warfare and combined arms tactics. Armed with lasguns and supported by armored vehicles, they reclaim urban territories effectively. Each soldier embodies resilience and adaptability, defending their homeworld and the Imperium in the grim darkness of the 41st millennium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Officers of Astra Militarum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Officers of the Militarum in Warhammer 40,000 have distinct attire: the Commissar wears a black greatcoat and peaked cap, the Militarum Priest dons religious robes, Militarum Engineseer which help Guard with thier tanks, the Field Medic dresses in standard fatigues with a red cross symbol, and the Sanctioned Psyker is clad in robes with psychic glyphs, bearing a glowing mark, and wielding a crackling staff.

ResearchProjectDef.label: abhuman integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: In the expansive lore of Warhammer 40,000, "Abhumans" is a collective term used to describe various non-standard human strains or subspecies that have evolved under different environmental conditions or circumstances. These Abhumans exhibit distinct physical and genetic traits that set them apart from the baseline human population.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ogryn integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Ogryn, massive abhumans employed as shock troopers by the Imperium of Man, are physically powerful mutants standing around 10 feet tall. They hail from cold, barren planets with high gravity, making them larger and bulkier than humans. Despite limited intellect, they compensate with overwhelming physical strength and loyalty, making them exceptional shock troops for direct assaults on the front lines of battle in the Astra Militarum's Militarum Auxilla.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ratling integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ratlings, small abhumans employed as snipers by the Imperium of Man, are granted Imperial citizenship despite their mutant status. They excel as marksmen, capable of precise shots from over a kilometer away. In battle, Ratlings can exact a heavy toll on enemy forces, using their knack for staying out of harm's way to their advantage.
